typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	PipelineRunId as string,
	PipelineTriggerTime as string,
	PipelineName as string
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	rowUrlColumn: 'SourceFileName',
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> SourceApi
Select2 derive(periodEndingDate = toDate(periodEndingDate),
		periodStartDate = toDate(periodStartDate),
		pipelineTriggerTime = fromUTC(toTimestamp(pipelineTriggerTime, 'yyyy-MM-dd\'T\'HH:mm:ss'), 'A.U.S. Eastern Standard Time'),
		payDate = toDate(payDate)) ~> CastDateType1
SourceApi select(mapColumn(
		baseRate,
		departmentCode,
		employeeId,
		employmentTypeCode,
		employmentTypeCodeDesc,
		firstName,
		{hoursOrA/DCode},
		{hoursOrA/DCodeDesc},
		idNumber,
		level1Code,
		level2Code,
		lineItemId,
		numberOfUnits,
		payDate,
		payMethodCode,
		payMethodCodeDesc,
		payRunOrganizationId,
		payRunPayRunId,
		payRunPeriodEndDate,
		payRunPeriodStartDate,
		payslipId,
		payslipNumber,
		periodEndingDate,
		periodStartDate,
		pipelineRunId,
		pipelineTriggerTime,
		positionTitle,
		projectCode,
		rate,
		surname,
		value,
		SourceFileName
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
CastDateType1 filter(greater(periodEndingDate, toDate("2021-10-15", 'yyyy-MM-dd'))) ~> Filter1
Filter1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'allErrors',
	outputRejectedData: true,
	rejectedData_fileSystem: 'container-adf-nido-prod-eastau-100-1',
	rejectedData_folderPath: (concat("ds_adsl2_stnidoprodeastau100_json/", $PipelineName, "/",
    toString(toTimestamp(left($PipelineTriggerTime, 26), 'yyyy-MM-dd\'T\'HH:mm:ss')),
    "_PipelineRunId_", $PipelineRunId, "_ErrorOutput")),
	transactionCommit: 'batch',
	reportSuccessOnError: false) ~> sinkSql
